intro: Sisymbrium meyenii, commonly known as the yellow rocket, is an annual herbaceous plant native to the Mediterranean region. It belongs to the Brassicaceae family, which includes many other cruciferous plants. The plant is characterized by its bright yellow flowers and pinnately compound leaves. It typically grows in disturbed soils and can be found in grasslands and along roadsides. Sisymbrium meyenii is known for its rapid growth and ability to thrive in a variety of environmental conditions.
